feature.label: Epsilon Compiler Generator Plugin
feature.description: A plugin for editing Extend Affix Grammar files (.eag). If a Gamma comiler generator (https://github.com/linkrope/gamma) is installed then D code is generated which represents a full capable compiler corresponding to the given EAG specification.
feature.copyright: Provided under the Eclipse Public License 2.0

update.label: Udate Site for the Epsilon Compiler Generator plugin
